Plot: Three brothers are reunited on the occasion of the death of his mother. The three are in a difficult stage of their lives due to economic difficulties: Bernard is a failed actor, Didier ...
Title: Les trois frères, le retour
Director: Didier Bourdon, Bernard Campan, Pascal Légitimus
Actors: Didier Bourdon, Bernard Campan, Pascal Légitimus, Sofia Lesaffre
